name: Grillin' Trees
description:
Grillin' Trees

You are lost in a magical forest and you have the power to burn it down.  Some trees will strike back.  Hide behind trees, set trees on fires, and heal yourself.  You can also jump, suupah jump, and shield yourself.

This game is an entry for the Shenanijam game jam.

Theme: Burn it Down

Extra: Maverick
